bipolarii22.Description: 22. I am inclined to think about myself much of the time.

bipolarii1.Description: 1. My mood often changes, from happiness to sadness, without my knowing why.

MeasurementToolMetadata.Description: Scale for Traits that Increase Risk for Bipolar II Disorder

bipolarii26.Description: 26. I feel that I never really get all that I need from people.

bipolarii28.Description: 28. I would rather stay free of involvements with others than risk disappointments.

bipolarii2.Description: 2. I have frequent ups and downs in mood, with and without apparent cause.

bipolarii5.Description: 5. There are times when my future looks very dark.

bipolarii29.Description: 29. While in trains, buses, etc, I often talk to strangers.

bipolarii6.Description: 6. Ideas run through my head so that I cannot sleep.

bipolarii31.Description: 31. I am inclined to be shy in the presence of the opposite sex.

bipolarii16.Description: 16. I am happiest when I get involved in some project that calls for rapid action.

bipolarii27.Description: 27. I don't like to buy clothes for myself.

bipolarii24.Description: 24. It is hard for me to ask someone for a favor.

bipolarii3.Description: 3. I often feel guilty without a very good reason for it.

bipolarii12.Description: 12. I am the kind of person who is "on the go" all the time.

bipolarii19.Description: 19. I like to indulge in a reverie (daydreaming).

bipolarii25.Description: 25. When I meet new people, I am afraid I won't do the right thing.

bipolarii8.Description: 8. Often I find it difficult to go to sleep because of thinking what happened during the day.

bipolarii4.Description: 4. My feelings are rather easily hurt.

bipolarii13.Description: 13. I am able to work unusually long hours without feeling tired.

bipollarii_sumscore.Description: Summary Score. For items 7, 20 and 29, False    1 point; for all the rest of the items, True    1 point; then sum across all points.

bipolarii21.Description: 21. I frequently find myself in a meditative state.

bipolarii15.Description: 15. I am quick in my actions.

bipolarii14.Description: 14. I am often so much on the go that sooner or later I wear myself out.

bipolarii7.Description: 7. I keep in fairly uniform spirits.

bipolarii23.Description: 23. My daydreams are frequently about things that can never come true.

bipolarii17.Description: 17. I have experienced periods so full of pep that sleep didn't seem to be necessary for days at a time.

bipolarii10.Description: 10. I am inclined to rush from one activity to another without pausing for enough rest.

bipolarii11.Description: 11. I am a horse for work; I am seldom exhausted.
